867450.name: One Wee Robot
867450.description:
Help Bobby on a time-hopping adventure to save the universe!

One Wee Robot is a 3D action-platformer where precision platforming meets fast-paced combat. Equip a different weapon on each arm and master creative combos as you battle through time to retrieve the Chronomodulator!

A betrayal for the ages!

Master robotologist Dr. Rusty McBolts has been betrayed! During an expedition to uncover one of the Five Pillars of Fabrication, Professor Cogsworth pilfered the Chronomodulator and hurled himself through time.

Rusty has created Bobby with one purpose: follow Cogsworth through time and… err… steal it back!

One big adventure!

Travel through time across 3 unique biomes, 15 handcrafted levels, and 5 epic boss fights as you collect Chronogers and unlock the path to Cogsworth:

  • Carburettor Cloggers: Journey to ancient oil fields filled with treacherous tombs and mechanical ruins. Outsmart deadly traps and solve riddles left behind by the now-senile SP-1N-X, the Great Prototype!

  • Robotian Ridges: Leap into the near future on a distant frontier planet littered with mine carts and train tracks. Battle the mischievous Robotian Racketeers and face off against their infamous leader, Billy-Bot!

  • Galvanised Glens: A legendary homeland lost to myth. Survive endless rain, eerie forests, and a mighty stronghold to face enemies from long-forgotten legends!

A buzzsaw boomerang? A wind-slinging scimitar? OVERCLOCK to win the day!

Craft and upgrade your own arsenal of 13 unique weapons. From the trusty melee Coghammer to the rapid-firing Piecesmaker, there’s a weapon for nearly any playstyle.

Fight with one arm to OVERCLOCK the other, unleashing devastating damage!

Invest in scrap for big rewards!

Defeating enemies and busting crates earns you Scrap. Spend it wisely to unlock permanent upgrades like the slide and double jump. Fully upgraded? No problem! It's time to take on Quabe Challenges!

Collect and conquer to look your absolute finest!

Beat challenges to unlock unique customisations! Each level contains challenges to keep you on your sprongs, are you up to the task?

  • Time Fuel: Hidden in each level; improves your durability.

  • Curios: Found in level by completing challenges; beat the level without being destroyed, defeat every enemy and finish the level within a time limit!

  • Relics: Each level contains a special bonus stage! Help a lost robot find their missing friends, chase down a mischievous gas wisp and score high at the shooting gallery!

If you're up to the task, you'll unlock unique customisations that will allow you to be the bot of the ball!

Knowledge is power! Find it in Cogsworth's Compendium!

Cogsworth may be your enemy, but he’s also a scholar! As you hop through the ages, you’ll decrypt fragments of Cogsworth's Compendium, a massive archive of the world and its weird inhabitants.

A Living Robotiary: Every robot you battle has a story! Automatically catalogue the enemies you defeat, learn their weaknesses, and read the Professor's own snarky observations.

Lore for Days: The universe wasn't always this chaotic. Piece together the lost history of the Five Pillars of Fabrication and their masters.

Can you find every entry and become the smartest bot in the timeline?

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
